title: Escape Speed
original_name: エスケヱプ・スピヰド
sinopse: Showa Era, year 101, summer. Kanaha who was being attacked by a rampaging battle weapon requested the help of a strange boy who was sleeping in a coffin. That was the moment where the two secured a pact of master and servant. The boy called himself Kichuu—the army's strongest weapon?!
